import React, { useEffect, useState,useContext } from 'react' import Axios from "axios" import { UserContext } from '../Context/UserContext' import axios from 'axios' import CheckoutPageItem from './CheckoutPageItem' function CheckoutPage() { const { orderId} = useContext(UserContext) const [order,setOrder] = useState() useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/GetAllItems/${orderId}`).then((res)=>{ setOrder(res.data) }) },[]) return (

Customer

{order&& order.lastName}

{order&& order.firstName}

asdasd

Order Info

Ordered at {order && order.createdAt}

PAYMENT DEJ MI PRACHY ZMRDE

PROTSTE NOT

Deliver To

City: ZLIN KUNDO

Street:APSJDPASJDPIASJD

PROTSTE NOT

{order&&order.items.map((item)=>{ return })}
Products
asdasd
Shipping
asdasd
Tax
asdasd
Total
asdasd
) } export default CheckoutPage
